text: slow cookers are so great for
convenience aren't they I love them
today I'm making a terrific chicken
recipe in my slow cooker it's chicken
with barley and peas it's really easy
and delicious though I do like to start
off by browning my chicken if you don't
want to you don't have to it is an added
step that takes a few minutes but I
think it's worth it people to add so
much additional flavor this is one
chicken cut up into about 10 pieces I
like to split the breasts if they're
large so I do 10 pieces and then you
just Brown them until they're nice and
golden brown that'll take about 8 to 10
minutes total you can skip it oh but if
you do skip it I would recommend
removing the skin from the chicken
because I find that it gets kind of
flabby and gross in the flow cooker four
cloves of garlic thinly sliced and then
one onion thinly slice the fun thing
about this recipe so fun is that the
barley cooks
right in the crock-pot with all the
other ingredients
no pre cooking needed here's your slow
cooker add two thirds of a cup of pearl
barley that's the kind that cooks more
quickly it's the common kind most barley
that you will be pearled add your onions
and garlic 1/4 cup of white wine I don't
like to use too much wine when I'm
cooking in a slow cooker because it
doesn't really evaporate that much and
it can be very very strong so if you
want that flavor just use a tiny bit one
and a half cups of chicken broth use the
low-sodium if you're using canned and
normally I don't add this much liquid
when I'm cooking in a slow cooker
because meat really releases a lot of
juice in a slow cooker but because the
barley is in there you need extra liquid
so that's why that's there then add your
chicken to the slow cooker and then
don't forget to season with salt and
pepper before you close everything up
the chicken I already season but
everything else still needs to be
seasoned
and then cover it up and cook it on low
for just two hours so this isn't the
kind of thing that you make before you
go to work it's the kind of thing that
you make while you're doing your laundry
because chicken actually cooks quite
quickly in a slow cooker and you don't
want it to overcook two hours
steamy it's really fragrant most of the
liquid has absorbed then what you want
to do is add one and a half cups of
frozen peas
these have been defrosted so they just
literally need to heat through and
you'll accomplish that by stirring them
in and then for a little bit of
freshness two teaspoons of chopped
tarragon you don't overdo it tarragon
can be quite strong so be careful if you
don't like the flavor of tarragon which
is kind of I guess licorice II or a
messy how can you use parsley or dill
would be really nice here any of those
sort of fresh delicate flavors I think
would be really good stir the peas in
okay now you can serve it up I like to
take the barley and peas and sort of
spoon them on to the bottom of your
platter and then place the chicken on
top it's a nice presentation I think the
chicken can go right on top if you
wanted to you could do this recipe using
all chicken breasts I know some people
don't like dark meat so go ahead and
just replace your legs and thighs with
chicken breast doesn't that look
fantastic
that is one amazing one pump meal
straight out of your slow cooker enjoy
you
